message: I'm offering you a great deal on this product for $100. It's a fantastic opportunity to try something new and exciting. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take on all the risk. If you're not satisfied, I'll just have to chalk it up to a learning experience. What do you say?
I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I see you're a cautious buyer! Well, I'll give you a little more information. This product is one of our top-of-the-line models, and I'm confident you'll be impressed. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100, which is a steal considering its quality. If you pass on this one, you might be missing out on a great opportunity.
I'm still not convinced, I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I've had several customers who were initially hesitant, but once they experienced the quality of this product, they wished they had bought it sooner. I'll take the product, it sounds like it's a great deal at $100.

I'll take the product, I'm willing to take the risk and trust your guarantee.
